programme.title: The Horses Of McBride
programme.desc: Nicki descobre dois cavalos presos na neve das Montanhas Rochosas e a sua próxima missão será arranjar uma forma de os salvar. Sem mais opções, pega numa pá e começa a escavar, inspirando o pai, Matt, e o resto da comunidade a juntarem-se para salvar os cavalos, mergulhados no espírito do Natal.

programme.title: Season's Greetings
programme.desc: Darcy escreve sobre romance com humor, mas na vida real ela é solteira e vive com quatro gatos. Quando o novo diretor executivo Will Harrington fica com a empresa pois o avô está doente, Darcy fica chocada com a sua péssima abordagem. Mas, apesar dos conflitos, há uma poderosa química entre os dois.

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: O Homem da Máscara de Ferro
programme.desc: Luís XIV é cruel e ambicioso: para subir ao trono, mandou encarcerar numa masmorra o seu irmão gémeo. Quando os três mosqueteiros descobrem este segredo, elaboram um plano de troca de identidade, a fim de dar a França o rei bondoso que merece.

programme.title: Árctico
programme.desc: Um homem perdido no meio do Ártico, depois de um desastre de avião, terá de decidir se deverá permanecer no seu relativamente seguro abrigo improvisado, ou embarcar numa viagem através do desconhecido que lhe poderá custar a vida.

programme.title: Morte Num Funeral
programme.desc: A cerimónia fúnebre de um pai de família é perturbada por uma série de incidentes, bem como pelas revelações de um desconhecido a propósito do defunto.

programme.title: Season's Greetings
programme.desc: Darcy escreve sobre romance com humor, mas na vida real ela é solteira e vive com quatro gatos. Quando o novo diretor executivo Will Harrington fica com a empresa pois o avô está doente, Darcy fica chocada com a sua péssima abordagem. Mas, apesar dos conflitos, há uma poderosa química entre os dois.

programme.title: Christmas List
programme.desc: Isobel Gray planeia um conto de fadas natalício com o namorado, incluindo um chalé coberto de neve em Northwest e uma criteriosa lista de desejos das típicas tradições de Natal. Mas quando o namorado desaparece, a lista acaba por se tornar num desafio e um romance tentador vira a sua vida do avesso.

programme.title: Window Wonderland
programme.desc: Os decoradores rivais Jake Dooley e Sloan Van Doren lutam entre si para ver quem brilha mais numa competição para criar a melhor montra de Natal, numa famosa loja de Nova Iorque. Na tentativa de se superarem, as montras vão ficando fora de controlo, culminando num verdadeiro desastre.

programme.title: Grace: Sem Filtros
programme.desc: Aos 18 anos, Grace é uma cantora gospel de grande sucesso na sua igreja. Um dia, é convidada para tentar uma carreira de ídolo pop e ser a nova Katy Perry. Grace parte para Los Angeles, onde as suas crenças serão testadas no concorrido mundo do espetáculo.

programme.title: O Homem da Máscara de Ferro
programme.desc: Luís XIV é cruel e ambicioso: para subir ao trono, mandou encarcerar numa masmorra o seu irmão gémeo. Quando os três mosqueteiros descobrem este segredo, elaboram um plano de troca de identidade, a fim de dar a França o rei bondoso que merece.

programme.title: Jogos Mais Perigosos
programme.desc: Chili, um empresário ligado à vida cinematográfica, está desencantado com a indústria e resolve mudar. Tenta dedicar-se à música, conhecendo pelo caminho a viúva de um executivo do meio musical.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hellebenzon-26367","dateCreated":"2017-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a fan anymore","reviewBody":"I was a hardcore fan for 11 seasons. programme.title: Mechanic: Assassino Profissional
programme.desc: Quando Arthur Bishop julgava que os seus dias como assassino eram coisa do passado, é forçado a voltar ao ativo quando Gina, o amor da sua vida, é raptada pelo seu inimigo mais perigoso. Mas na mira estão nomes, aparentemente, impossíveis de eliminar.

programme.title: MIB³: Homens de Negro 3
programme.desc: Quando a vida de K e o destino do planeta estão em jogo, o agente J viaja no tempo para remediar as coisas. Entretanto, quando faz equipa com o agente K mais novo para salvar o seu parceiro, J descobre alguns segredos sobre a Agência e o futuro da humanidade.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliação
programme.desc: A equipa dos G.I. Joe volta para enfrentar, mais uma vez, os Cobra, bem como perigosas novas ameaças dentro do Governo. Incriminados por um crime terrível, mas que não cometeram, só lhes resta uma opção: retaliação.

programme.title: Blood Father - O Protetor
programme.desc: Link, um ex-presidiário, está determinado a proteger a sua filha de 17 anos de um perigoso cartel de droga que a quer matar. E de, pela primeira vez na sua vida, fazer o que está certo...

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,2,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: MIB: Homens de Negro - Força Internacional
programme.desc: Os Homens de Negro sempre protegeram a Terra da escória do Universo. Nesta nova aventura, eles enfrentam a maior ameaça de sempre: um infiltrado dentro da organização MIB.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: No velho oeste, um caçador de recompensas esconde o seu bom coração por trás do seu rosto deformado e da sua personalidade forte. Mais uma vítima do terrível Quentin Turnbull, Hex, que deveria ter morrido num atentado contra a sua vida, ressuscitou.... com sede de vingança.

programme.title: Outro/Eu
programme.desc: Um homem transfere a sua consciência para um corpo jovem e saudável. No entanto, cedo descobre que o procedimento a que se submeteu e a empresa que o efetuou não são exatamente aquilo que ele pensava...

programme.title: Payback - A Vingança
programme.desc: O assalto foi fácil e o dinheiro estava no papo. Mas ao dividir os lucros, Val cometeu três erros: levou o dinheiro e a mulher de Porter, e tentou acabar com a vida do parceiro. Agora, Porter quer o dinheiro de volta e não interessa como o consegue. E não vai parar enquanto não tiver a sua vingança.

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Sintonia de Amor
programme.desc: O arquiteto Sam Baldwin fica muito abatido após a morte da esposa, pelo que Jonah, o filho de oito anos, acha que o pai deve encontrar uma mulher. Como tal, no dia de Natal, decide ligar para um programa de rádio e contar a sua história. Uma das mulheres que o ouve é Annie Reed, prestes a casar-se.

programme.title: Soldado Milhões
programme.desc: Aníbal Augusto Milhais é um soldado português da Primeira Guerra Mundial. Na Batalha de La Lys, contrariando ordens superiores, enfrenta sozinho sucessivas ofensivas alemãs de maneira a garantir a retirada dos companheiros.

programme.title: Super-Homem IV: Em Busca da Paz
programme.desc: Lex Luthor rouba de um museu um cabelo da cabeça do Super-Homem e usa-o para criar o Homem Nuclear, um androide que extrai a sua energia do Sol. O seu objetivo, claro, é usá-lo como arma para matar o Super-Homem, para que Luthor possa ficar livre para concretizar os seus planos maléficos.

programme.title: Cowboys em Nova Iorque
programme.desc: Dois amigos de infância que são cowboys de rodeo viajam do Novo México até Nova Iorque em busca de um amigo que desapareceu enquanto procurava a filha, que foi levada ilegalmente de Cuba para os EUA.

programme.title: Paddington 2 (V.P.)
programme.desc: Paddington vive agora uma vida feliz com a família Brown e é um membro popular na comunidade local. Quando a sua tia Lucy faz 100 anos, Paddington encontra um livro único na loja de antiguidades e aceita uma série de trabalhos estranhos para o comprar.

programme.title: Com a Casa às Costas
programme.desc: Em vez das prometidas férias no Havai, um pai de família californiano impõe aos seus familiares uma viagem ao Colorado a bordo de uma caravana.

programme.title: E.T. - O Extraterrestre
programme.desc: A história da amizade entre um extraterrestre perdido na Terra e um menino, de 10 anos, que o esconde em casa. A criança tenta evitar, a todo o custo, que o amigo seja capturado e transformado numa cobaia pelos serviços secretos americanos, tentando ajudá-lo a regressar a casa.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: Dick e Jane - Ladrões sem Jeito
programme.desc: Quando tudo parecia correr lindamente, Dick é despedido e, meses depois, a casa está hipotecada, a mulher vendeu o corpo à ciência e ele vive de biscates. Desesperado, o casal vira-se para o assalto à mão armada, com o plano de roubar aos ricos para dar aos pobres... ou seja, a eles próprios.

programme.title: Vingança Sem Rosto
programme.desc: Um cientista vê mais do que devia e é vítima disso, ficando com o corpo todo queimado. Entretanto, resolve implantar em si a pele artificial em que trabalhava e que permite modelar qualquer tipo de rosto. Dá então início à sua vingança.

programme.title: O Último a Cair
programme.desc: Durante a Lei Seca nos EUA, um pistoleiro é apanhado no meio de uma guerra entre gangsters das máfias italiana e irlandesa.

programme.title: Os Irmãos Sisters
programme.desc: No velho oeste, dois irmãos, Charlie e Eli Sisters, são contratados para matar um prospetor de ouro. Começa assim uma implacável caçada, mas também uma jornada que irá testar os laços entre os dois irmãos.

programme.title: El Mariachi
programme.desc: Um jovem mariachi tem o sonho de cantar. Para isso, decide ir à procura de trabalho numa localidade da fronteira mexicana, onde chega ao mesmo tempo que um famoso assassino. Como possui as mesmas características físicas deste, é confundido com ele e, por isso, vê-se obrigado a esconder-se.

programme.title: Festa de Natal da Empresa
programme.desc: A diretora-geral Carol Vanstone tenta encerrar a sucursal do seu irmão folião, pelo que ele e o seu diretor técnico, Josh Parker, têm de reunir os colegas de trabalho e dar a mais estrondosa festa de Natal! Tudo para impressionar um potencial cliente, que irá salvar os seus empregos.

programme.title: Falhados... Por um Fio
programme.desc: Três amigos, Gus, Richie e Clark, passaram a adolescência no banco dos suplentes. No entanto, graças a um bilionário e ao seu filho, o trio vai ter uma segunda oportunidade de brilhar nos campos de basebol.

programme.title: Submarino U-571
programme.desc: Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, a Marinha americana combate um submarino alemão com o intuito de lhes roubar um descodificador secreto.

programme.title: Sempre Loucos
programme.desc: Comédia que conta as explorações hilariantes de uma banda fenómeno dos anos 70, os "Strange Fruit", quando se reúnem 20 anos após uma separação difícil e tentam readquirir a fama e fortuna entretanto perdidas.

programme.title: Assassinos Substitutos
programme.desc: A hesitação de um assassino a soldo em cumprir a missão de morte de que foi incumbido coloca-o na mira de implacáveis atiradores encarregues de o eliminar.

programme.title: O Homem Que Brilha
programme.desc: Dois polícias são obrigados a trabalhar juntos para tentar descobrir um assassino conhecido como "Homem de Família".

programme.title: O Amigo Gigante (V.P.)
programme.desc: A maravilhosa história de uma menina, Sofia, e de um gigante que lhe apresenta as maravilhas e perigos do País dos Gigantes. O Amigo Gigante é simples, carinhoso e recusa-se a comer humanos, ao contrário dos outros gigantes...

programme.title: Terra Chama Echo
programme.desc: Um grupo de amigos começa a receber mensagens estranhas nos telemóveis, mas os pais e as autoridades não dão importância a essas frases codificadas. Por sua conta e risco, os jovens embarcam numa aventura e descobrem um extraterrestre que precisa da sua ajuda.

programme.title: Paddington (V.P.)
programme.desc: As divertidas desventuras de um jovem urso peruano, que viaja até Londres à procura de um lar. Perdido na Estação de Comboios de Paddington, ele começa a temer que a vida da cidade não seja como imaginava... até que conhece a família Brown.

programme.title: Resgate
programme.desc: Um milionário proprietário de uma companhia de aviação descobre que o seu filho, de nove anos, foi sequestrado e pedem-lhe um resgate de dois milhões de dólares. Inicialmente prontifica-se a pagar o resgate, mas quando conclui que vão matar o seu filho após o pagamento, decide reverter o jogo.

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Uns Pais do Pior
programme.desc: Frank e Nancy levam a sua única filha à faculdade e quando regressam a casa, num bairro da classe alta, constatam que as suas poupanças diminuem rapidamente. Recorrem então a medidas extremas para esconder a sua situação e manter as aparências...

programme.title: Air América
programme.desc: Durante a Guerra do Vietname, Gene é um piloto contratado pela CIA para transportar abastecimentos a forças indígenas que combatem os comunistas. Mas o seu negócio lateral de contrabando de armas fica em risco quando é forçado a trabalhar com um jovem rebelde que desafia todas as ordens.

programme.title: Aonde É Que Pára a Polícia
programme.desc: A mais louca academia de polícia de sempre volta a meter-se em sarilhos mas acaba a fazer um vistão, desta vez impedindo o homicídio da Rainha de Inglaterra.

programme.title: Aonde é Que Pára a Polícia 2 1/2: O Cheiro do Medo
programme.desc: O tenente Frank Drebbin regressa para salvar o dia, desta vez a sua missão é contra as grandes companhias energéticas que raptam um cientista que encontrou uma alternativa ao petróleo.

programme.title: Aonde é que Pára a Polícia 33 1/3
programme.desc: O trapalhão policia Frank Debrin interrompe a sua reforma para impedir que terroristas expludam a cerimónia da entrega dos Óscares.

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie: Potência Máxima
programme.desc: O trio prepara-se para recuperar duas alianças: mas não são uns anéis quaisquer. Contêm informação encriptada que revela informações preciosas acerca de pessoas inseridas no programa de proteção de testemunhas. Quando as testemunhas começam a morrer, só os Anjos podem travar o assassino.

programme.title: Chama-me Pai Natal
programme.desc: Quando Lucy Collins, uma bem sucedida produtora de televisão, contrata um ator para ser o Pai Natal do seu programa de telecompras, ganha mais do que poderia imaginar.

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
The Night Shift: Turno da Noite
Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Il Faut Que Jeunesse Se Passe
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Candice is a modern mom with an active love life. IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Natal a Quanto Obrigas
programme.desc: Joy Robertson decide entrar em greve na época de Natal. Tudo porque o marido e os filhos estão focados nas suas próprias atividades e não ajudam com os preparativos de Natal...

programme.title: A Árvore do Anjo
programme.desc: Uma escritora procura descobrir a identidade da pessoa que a ajuda a conceder desejos pedidos à Árvore do Anjo e, enquanto isso, reata a amizade com um amigo de infância.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Herança Fatal
programme.desc: Hailey, uma antiga procuradora do Ministério Público, utiliza as suas competências e os seus contactos quando a sua amiga Pam desaparece enquanto tratava de vender a grande propriedade dos pais, já falecidos.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Encontro de Morte
programme.desc: Uma aplicação de encontros é capaz de matar. Quando Hailey começa a investigar o homicídio, suspeita que o crime tenha tido origem numa crítica negativa, mas mais tarde percebe que alguém anda a matar por outra razão.

programme.title: Um Milagre de Natal
programme.desc: Quando a patroa lhe rouba a ideia para o artigo de capa da revista, Ema procura um milagre de Natal sobre o qual escrever com a ajuda do filho e do fotógrafo bem-parecido.

programme.title: Mesmo a Tempo do Natal
programme.desc: Uma jovem professora de psicologia deve escolher entre percorrer todo o país para aceitar seu emprego dos sonhos ou permanecer em sua cidade natal para se casar com o seu homem ideal.

programme.title: A Mexicana
programme.desc: Jerry deve trazer do México uma pistola de grande valor: a "Mexicana", que transporta uma maldição lendária. Além de ter que despistar os que o perseguem, Jerry é acompanhado pela namorada, perita em complicações...

programme.title: Um Natal Iluminado
programme.desc: Inspirado em factos verídicos, duas semanas antes do Natal, Emma regressa à sua cidade, construída em torno da fábrica de iluminações de Natal da sua família.

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Aux Grand Maux, Les Grands Remèdes
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Category: Comedy|Crime|Drama|Comedy|Crime|Drama
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR1,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Noite de Natal
programme.desc: Uma série de contratempos ameaça os planos de uma mãe, recentemente divorciada, que tenta oferecer aos filhos um Natal perfeito, o primeiro sem o pai.

programme.title: Natal na Vinha
programme.desc: Brooke, uma jovem executiva da área do marketing, volta à sua cidade natal entusiasmada para reviver as suas recordações de Natal enquanto ajuda a família a manter o negócio dos vinhos. Mas a sua missão envolve uma parceria improvável com Tyler, o carismático, mas teimoso dono da vinha.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: Encontro de Morte
programme.desc: Uma aplicação de encontros é capaz de matar. Quando Hailey começa a investigar o homicídio, suspeita que o crime tenha tido origem numa crítica negativa, mas mais tarde percebe que alguém anda a matar por outra razão.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mystery: 2 + 2 = Homicídio
programme.desc: A sobrinha de Hailey diz-lhe que a sua professora de música, a força motriz por trás da recolha de fundos para as obras na escola, queria falar com ela no papel de ex-procuradora. Como a professora desaparece, Hailey investiga e encontra sangue. A Polícia interroga todos os professores.

programme.title: Diana
programme.desc: Sofia é uma acompanhante de luxo que trabalha em casa e apresenta-se aos clientes como Manuela. Jano é seu cliente e apresenta-se como Hugo. Quem são Sofia e Jano? Nenhum deles é quem parece ser...

programme.title: O Cadáver de Anna Fritz
programme.desc: Anna Fritz é uma atriz linda e famosa, que acabou de morrer e cujo corpo vai para a morgue. Três jovens decidem ir ver o corpo nu da artista, mas acabam por não resistir à tentação e como resultado mergulham num inferno sem igual, do qual será muito difícil sair.

programme.title: The Boy - Segue as Regras
programme.desc: Greta é contratada para tomar conta de Brahms. No entanto, mal chega, descobre que o menino é afinal um boneco de porcelana em tamanho real. Agora só tem de cumprir as regras dos "pais" de Brahms sobre a "criança". Ignorá-las poderá ser aterrador.

programme.title: Os Tradutores
programme.desc: Nove pessoas, contratadas para traduzir o livro final de uma trilogia de grande sucesso, estão confinadas num bunker. Mas quando as primeiras páginas do manuscrito secreto aparecem online, as suspeitas recaem sobre os tradutores – e o editor fará tudo para encontrar o culpado.

programme.title: Todo o Dinheiro do Mundo
programme.desc: A história verídica do rapto do neto de 16 anos de um dos homens mais ricos do mundo, Jean Paul Getty, e da tentativa desesperada da sua mãe em convencer o bilionário a pagar o resgate, numa autêntica corrida contra o tempo.

programme.title: Estrada de Fogo
programme.desc: Por entre uma melancólica paisagem de rock 'n' roll, o bando de motociclistas Bombers, liderado pelo perverso Raven Shaddock, rapta a diva Ellen Aim. A esperança dela na salvação repousa em improváveis heróis: o soldado da fortuna Tom Cody e a sua companheira, a vigorosa amiga da bebida, McCoy.

programme.title: Cosmoball - Os Jogadores da Galáxia
programme.desc: Uma enorme nave espacial ergue-se acima da Terra – é uma espécie de estádio para um jogo vagamente parecido com o futebol moderno, mas a velocidades incrivelmente altas. Este é um jogo de bola espacial e quando o jogo começa, o mundo para para ver.

programme.title: Não Te Metas Com o Zohan
programme.desc: Lavar, secar e salvar o mundo! Zohan, um comando israelita, simula a própria morte, com o objetivo de perseguir um sonho: tornar-se o cabeleireiro mais famoso de Nova Iorque.

programme.title: O Rececionista
programme.desc: Um rececionista de hotel, com tendências voyeuristas, torna-se objeto de uma investigação de homicídio.

programme.title: A Arte da Guerra: Traição
programme.desc: Reformado ao fim de uma carreira irrepreensível, o agente Neil Shaw vê-se subitamente envolvido num estranho e secreto plano para assassinar vários senadores.

programme.title: A Máscara de Zorro
programme.desc: Passaram mais de 20 anos desde que Don Diego de la Vega lutou com sucesso contra a opressão espanhola, com o lendário e romântico nome de Zorro. Preso durante duas décadas, tem agora de encontrar um sucessor para travar Don Rafael Montero, que regressou ao território com um louco projeto na manga.

programme.title: Nome de Código: Mercúrio
programme.desc: Os Estados Unidos inventaram um código de encriptação de mensagens ultrassecreto, o "Mercury Code", que inclui tecnologia de computação, matemática e física subatómica que pensam ser inviolável. Mas Simon, um autista de 9 anos, olha para a mensagem e decifra o código de imediato.

programme.title: Promessa Sangrenta
programme.desc: Em Los Angeles, um ex-presidiário surpreende tudo e todos no mundo das competições de luta ilegais para cumprir uma promessa a um amigo morto.

programme.title: Golpe Final
programme.desc: Após um grupo de terroristas raptar a sua sobrinha num jogo de futebol, um ex-soldado, com técnicas de combate fatais, inicia uma guerra para salvá-la e evitar a destruição maciça.

programme.title: O Espectro de Sharon Tate
programme.desc: Aos 26 anos, Sharon Tate é uma estrela em ascensão em Hollywood, que está prestes a dar à luz o seu primeiro filho, do realizador Roman Polanski. Atormentada por terríveis visões, os seus piores pesadelos tornar-se-ão realidade com a entrada em cena de Charles Manson e do seu culto mortal.

programme.title: A Última Batalha
programme.desc: Na Segunda Guerra Mundial, um pequeníssimo mas determinado pelotão de soldados norte-americanos aceita a missão quase suicida de entrar em perigoso território inimigo para impedir que uma unidade alemã fure as linhas aliadas.

programme.title: O Meu Cão Estúpido
programme.desc: Henri é um escritor de meia-idade em crise criativa e cheio de angústias existenciais. No momento em que ele reavalia a sua vida, entra-lhe em casa um enorme cão cinzento, indelicado e fedorento e acaba por mudar tudo.

programme.title: O Herói
programme.desc: Vitório regressa da guerra. Uma guerra que durou quase três décadas, na qual entrou forçado, aos 15 anos, como soldado raso. Vitório matou gente, viu os amigos morrerem, passou fome, pisou uma mina e perdeu uma perna. Após uma lenta recuperação, Vitório tenta a sua sorte nas ruas de Luanda.

programme.title: Beatriz e Romeu (V.P.)
programme.desc: Romeu, um artista errante que sonha ser cavaleiro, conhece Beatriz e apaixona-se por ela, nunca suspeitando que era filha do rei. No entanto, a felicidade dos dois não estava para durar...

programme.title: After
programme.desc: Tessa Young é uma jovem reservada, que se apaixona por um inglês insolente e problemático, com um segredo obscuro. Os dois embarcam numa inesperada relação que tem tanto de intensa como de turbulenta.

programme.title: Beethoven 2
programme.desc: Na segunda parte das aventuras de Beethoven, o nosso herói conhece Missy, a cadela São Bernardo dos seus sonhos. Mas infelizmente terá que separar-se dela por causa de Regina, a dona de Missy, uma mulher terrível que a usa como moeda de troca para resolver o seu divórcio.

programme.title: Debate Pela Liberdade
programme.desc: A história verídica de Melvin B. Tolson, um professor da Wiley College, no Texas, que em 1935 inspirou os seus estudantes a formarem a primeira equipa de debate daquela faculdade de alunos negros, que acabou por desafiar a mais prestigiada Harvard no campeonato nacional.

programme.title: Nome de Código: Mercúrio
programme.desc: Os Estados Unidos inventaram um código de encriptação de mensagens ultrassecreto, o "Mercury Code", que inclui tecnologia de computação, matemática e física subatómica que pensam ser inviolável. Mas Simon, um autista de 9 anos, olha para a mensagem e decifra o código de imediato.

programme.title: Má Vizinhança
programme.desc: Um jovem casal, que ainda está a adaptar-se às novas rotinas que o nascimento da sua filha trouxe, passa a ser vizinho de uma república de estudantes, que se instala na casa do lado. Uma lembrança constante de tudo o que tiveram de abdicar para serem pais.

programme.title: Ousadas e Golpistas
programme.desc: Inspirado na história verídica de um grupo de strippers que se unem para preparar uma vingança contra os seus clientes ricos de Wall Street.

programme.title: Girls Night
programme.desc: Quatro melhores amigas do tempo da escola reúnem-se, 10 anos mais tarde, para uma despedida de solteira selvagem em Miami. Pippa, uma amiga recente da noiva, também se junta ao grupo. A festa louca sofre uma reviravolta inesperada quando as cinco amigas matam acidentalmente um stripper.

programme.title: A Última Noitada
programme.desc: Ethan, Isaac e Chris passam juntos a noite de Natal há 10 anos. Uma noite de deboche, para quebrar todas as regras. Mas chegou a última noite desta tradição e, quando ela terminar, estes três grandes amigos ganharão finalmente algum juízo. Ou não...

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sam Hill, Joe Chappelle, Scott Lautanen, Karen Gaviola, Matt Earl Beesley

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="
